original_title: Rupee has become a ping pong ball; Gammanpila attacks CB top officials
original_body_lines: The responsibility of the Central Bank is to stabilize the rupee and not allow it to fluctuate, MP Udaya Gammanpila said.
“The rupee has now become a ping pong ball,” Gammanpila added.
He said the Central Bank’s top officials appear to be ignorant of their constitutional duty in stabilizing the rupee.
